name: COMMONWEALTH of Pennsylvania, Respondent, v. Keemen COPELAND, Petitioner

parties: COMMONWEALTH of Pennsylvania, Respondent, v. Keemen COPELAND, Petitioner.

opinions.text:
ORDER
PER CURIAM:
AND NOW, this 27th day of October 2000, the petition for allowance of appeal is GRANTED, limited to the issue of:
Whether the petitioner’s constitutional right to confrontation was violated by introduction into evidence of admissions made by a non-testifying co-defendant?
opinions.author: PER CURIAM:

attorneys: Christopher D. Warren, Philadelphia, for petitioner.
casebody.head_matter:
761 A.2d 139
COMMONWEALTH of Pennsylvania, Respondent, v. Keemen COPELAND, Petitioner.
Supreme Court of Pennsylvania.
Oct. 27, 2000.
Christopher D. Warren, Philadelphia, for petitioner.
